name: Metamorpho Mania! Trivia Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Rex Mason.

	Rex Mason was an archaeologist before he became Metamorpho. He traveled to Egypt, and it was there that he gained his powers. Carter Hall is another archaeologist. He also goes by the name of Hawkman.

questions.text: Metamorpho was sent to retrieve the Orb of Ra. Under whose employ did he do this?
questions.explanation:
Simon Stagg.

	Rex Mason was none too fond of his employer, but Stagg's beautiful daughter Sapphire more than made up for it. Prolonged exposure to the Orb made Mason become Metamorpho!

questions.text: A sidekick for Metamorpho was introduced in the tenth issue of his first series.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Element Girl was invented to act as a rival to Sapphire, who still returned Mason's love after he became Metamorpho. With powers similar to Metamorpho's, she petered out quickly and was killed off years later.

questions.text: Metamorpho was a founding member of which team?
questions.explanation:
The Outsiders.

	The Outsiders consisted of outcast heroes who didn't fit the mold set by Superman and others. Other members included Black Lightning and Geo-Force. They were initially led by Batman.

questions.text: Metamorpho proposed to his girlfriend, Sapphire Stagg.
questions.explanation:
False.

	She proposed to him, and he was happy to accept. Sapphire popped the question after he and the Outsiders returned from a time-travel adventure!

questions.text: What is the name of Metamorpho's son?
questions.explanation:
Joseph.

	Joseph had powers similar to his father, but he couldn't control them! Unless contained, he would change elements randomly. Metamorpho left him in the care of his grandfather, Simon Stagg.

questions.text: Metamorpho declined an invitation to join the Justice League of America.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Metamorpho went to the Justice League looking for a way to be cured of his freakish visage, but the JLA could do nothing for him. He also declined an offer of membership, but later helped them on several cases.

questions.text: Which actor provided Metamorpho's voice in the animated series "Justice League"?
questions.explanation:
Tom Sizemore.

	Tom Everett Scott provided the voice of Booster Gold, Ron Perlman was Clayface and Mark Hamill was Solomon Grundy. In the episode "Metamorphosis", Rex Mason was an old friend of John Stewart, the Green Lantern. "Metamorphosis" aired on October 4th, 2002.

questions.text: In the animated series "Justice League", what did John Stewart and Rex Mason have in common?
options: They went to the same college
questions.explanation:
They were both ex-Marines.

	Rex and John were both ex-Marines, and served together as such. Metamorpho also briefly appeared in the "Justice League Unlimited" episode "Clash". The episode aired on June 11th, 2005.

questions.text: Shortly before the "One Year Later" event, Metamorpho was seen helping Batman defeat which installment?
questions.explanation:
The Brother Eye Satellite.

	Brother Eye commanded an army of OMACs, highly dangerous cyborgs, to kill every metahuman on Earth. Along with Metamorpho and Batman, Booster Gold, Green Lantern and Mister Terrific helped to shut the satellite down.
